labels.title: It's very easy to have amazing photos of your trip.

steps.desc1: Choose your destination and date for your photoshoot.
steps.desc2: Chat with your local photographer, he will give you the best tips for your session.
steps.desc3: Local photographers take your session, live the Memorick experience.
steps.desc4: Receive your photos in 72 hours * and download them to your cell phone or computer.
steps.desc5: Relive your moments and remember your trip forever.

labels.help-you: We are here to help you
labels.faq-title: These are some of the most frequently asked questions.

questions.q1: How can I book a photo session with Memorick?
questions.a1:
1. Click on book to start your booking process, Where you will provide us with details of your travel information, such as - destination(s), date, time, number of people, special requirements, etc.
  2. After answering all questions, you will receive a detailed email with a link to your personal photoshoot order. Meanwhile, your destination photographer will confirm availability on the date and time.
  3. Once the Photographer confirms his availability, we will notify you and the booking fee will be charged to the selected payment method. After that, the date and time is secured.
  4. After the photo-shoot is confirmed, you will be able to chat directly with your Photographer through the site. This way, logistics, questions or adjustments about the session can be made.
questions.q2: What determines the cost of my service?
questions.a2:
Prices may vary depending on the destination, people and duration of the photo session. Our goal is to offer high quality at the most affordable prices.
Explore our destinations , click on your favorite and check our rates!
questions.q3: How can I guarantee the date I requested?
questions.a3: Once the booking deposit is covered, the date is yours!
questions.q4: How do I pay for my photo session?
questions.a4:
Payment is made in two steps:
  1. Deposit to secure your reservation date: We will send you a PayPal request by email or you can transfer or deposit directly to our bank account.
  2. Remaining amount must be paid in cash to the photographer on the day of the photoshoot, in local currency, when the photoshoot ends.
questions.q5: Can I pay the full price of the service in one payment?
questions.a5: Yes, we will send you the PayPal link to pay the total amount of the service. ** There may be an additional commission of 5% when using PayPal services.
questions.q6: How far in advance should I reserve my photoshoot?
questions.a6: You can book 10 months in advance, but it is suggested that it not be 2 weeks in advance. However, if you are on a tight schedule before your trip, we will always try to organize your photoshoot so that you can click on your memories!
questions.q7: Where can I see examples of photos taken at a specific destination?
questions.a7: See our main destinations section; Here you can take a look at what you will experience. Do you want to see more examples in a specific destination? Send us an email to: info@memorick.com requesting them!
questions.q8: Will I have to pay the photographer's travel expenses?
questions.a8: All our photographers are local, this means living in the destination where the shoot will take place, so there is no need to cover their travel expenses.
questions.q9: Are there any additional charges that I must pay the day of the photoshoot?
questions.a9: It all depends on the details of your photoshoot. In some cases, you will have to pay the transportation and / or admission expenses to the places where the photo session is held. In this case, customers must cover the photographer's expenses as well.
questions.q10: I want a photo session in a destination that does not appear on your list.
questions.a10: Memorick is constantly growing and we will always try to help you get a photoshoot in any destination. We suggest that you inform us in advance so that we can find you a local photographer and be able to provide the service.
questions.q11: How many people can participate in the photo session?
questions.a11: As many as you want! However, the rates vary according to the number of people. Usually, our standard rate is 1 to 5 people. If you have six or more people in your group, there will be an additional charge. Let us know if your party is too big, we can find a way to create a package that suits your needs.
questions.q12: What happens if I am late or need to cancel my photo session?
questions.a12: Notify us by email info@memorick.com or chat with us through the Facebook page facebook.com/memorickphotography. We will fix the solution that suits you. If the photo session is canceled due to weather conditions or force majeure, the reservation fee will be taken into account for another photo session in the future. Read our Terms and Conditions for more information about our refund policies.
questions.q13: What happens if there are weather contingencies (rain, snow, etc.)?
questions.a13: Since we know that you are in a certain destination for a couple of days, our photographers will assess whether it is feasible to keep on the track with the original schedule based on weather conditions. If necessary, we suggest alternative locations or, if possible, reprogram.
questions.q14: What is the tolerance policy to wait for customers at the meeting point?
questions.a14: Our tolerance time is 30 minutes. We suggest you notify us in advance to the following email info@memorick.com in case you are late, in order to reschedule the agenda.
questions.q15: When can we see our photos?
questions.a15: Our promise is to deliver them in 72 hours * after the photo session. We will email you a link to a high-resolution online digital gallery that you can access from any portable device or computer.

modif.part1: When making a change or cancellation a charge will be made according to our
modif.part2:
Cancellations or changes of time, destination and / or number of people are subject to approval by Memorick and availability of the photographer.

Confirmation of a change requires the approval of the Memorick staff.
It is not possible to manage changes directly between client and photographer.

Changes or cancellations must be requested at least 48 hours prior to the photo session.
